item.title: My CRTS Feedback
item.description: Hello everyone, Happy New Year ! This is actually my first post of 2023 and nothing better than to tell you about a certification I just completed. What’s CRTS ? CRTS or Certified Red Team Specialist from Cyber Warfare is a Technical Certification designed to improve your Red Team skills in many Offensive Fields. Your goal is to compromise an entire lab including 4 different networks ! You must use one of three attack paths to do this.

item.title: My eJPT feedback
item.description: eJPT Experience Hello There ! Here is a small post about my eJPT feedback ! I passed my eJPT on the 27th of August and validate it after 3h. I didn’t take the course, only one voucher. To pass the exam, you may need to answer 15 correct questions. Exam Guide The Exam for the eJPT is well guided, you’ll need to answer 20 multiple choices question before the 3 days due date after starting your exam.
